hooks.name: Auto-Format TypeScript
hooks.description: Automatically format TypeScript files with Prettier after editing
hooks.command: npx prettier --write "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Auto-Format Python
hooks.description: Automatically format Python files with Black after editing
hooks.command: black "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Auto-Format Rust
hooks.description: Automatically format Rust files with rustfmt after editing
hooks.command: rustfmt "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Auto-Format Go
hooks.description: Automatically format Go files with gofmt after editing
hooks.command: gofmt -w "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Log Bash Commands
hooks.description: Log all bash commands to a file for audit trail
hooks.command: echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $TOOL_DESCRIPTION: $TOOL_COMMAND" >> .claude/command-log.txt

hooks.name: Log File Changes
hooks.description: Track all file edits and writes to a change log
hooks.command: echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Modified: $TOOL_FILE_PATH" >> .claude/changes.log

hooks.name: Protect Environment Files
hooks.description: Prevent modifications to .env and other sensitive configuration files
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(env|secret|key)$|package-lock\.json|\.git/'; then echo 'ERROR: Cannot modify protected file' && exit 1; fi

hooks.name: Protect Production Files
hooks.description: Block edits to production configuration and deployment files
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE 'production|prod\.'; then echo 'ERROR: Cannot modify production files' && exit 1; fi

hooks.name: Run Tests After Code Changes
hooks.description: Automatically run tests after modifying source code files
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js|py|go|rs)$'; then npm test 2>/dev/null || pytest 2>/dev/null || cargo test 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Lint on Save
hooks.description: Run linter after file edits to ensure code quality
hooks.command: npx eslint "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" --fix 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Update Documentation Timestamp
hooks.description: Add 'Last Updated' timestamp to documentation files
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.md$'; then sed -i "1s/^/<!-- Last Updated: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') -->\n/" "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Validate Markdown
hooks.description: Check markdown files for broken links and formatting issues
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.md$'; then npx markdownlint "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Desktop Notification on Stop
hooks.description: Show desktop notification when Claude finishes a task
hooks.command: notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Task completed' 2>/dev/null || osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"' 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Session Start Notification
hooks.description: Log and notify when a new Claude Code session starts
hooks.command: echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Session started" >> .claude/session.log && echo 'Claude Code session started'

hooks.name: Backup Before Edit
hooks.description: Create a backup of files before editing them
hooks.command: mkdir -p .claude/backups && cp "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" ".claude/backups/$(basename "$TOOL_FILE_PATH").$(date +%s).bak" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Auto-Stage Git Changes
hooks.description: Automatically stage file changes in git after edits
hooks.command: git add "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Check Git Status on Session Start
hooks.description: Display git status when starting a session
hooks.command: git status -s 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Enforce Commit Message Format
hooks.description: Validate commit messages follow conventional commits format
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -q 'git commit'; then echo "$TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -qE 'feat:|fix:|docs:|style:|refactor:|test:|chore:' || (echo 'ERROR: Commit message must follow conventional commits format' && exit 1); fi

hooks.name: Generate Changelog Entry
hooks.description: Automatically update CHANGELOG.md with git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -q 'git commit'; then echo "- $(date '+%Y-%m-%d'): $(git log -1 --pretty=%B)" >> CHANGELOG.md 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Check Dependencies on Session Start
hooks.description: Verify all project dependencies are installed
hooks.command: npm outdated 2>/dev/null || pip list --outdated 2>/dev/null || cargo outdated 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Security Scan on File Changes
hooks.description: Run security scanner on modified files
hooks.command: npm audit 2>/dev/null || pip-audit 2>/dev/null || cargo audit 2>/dev/null || true

hooks.name: Generate Code Metrics
hooks.description: Calculate code complexity and metrics after changes
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js)$'; then npx complexity-report "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Generate API Documentation
hooks.description: Auto-generate API docs from code comments
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js)$'; then npx jsdoc "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" -d docs 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Spell Check Documentation
hooks.description: Run spell checker on documentation files
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.md$'; then npx cspell "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Performance Check
hooks.description: Run performance analysis on code changes
hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ts|js)$'; then node --prof "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

hooks.name: Notify on Long-Running Tasks
hooks.description: Alert when subagent tasks take longer than expected
hooks.command: echo 'Subagent task completed' && notify-send 'Claude Code' 'Subagent finished' 2>/dev/null || true
